events.name: Ukrainian Prime Minister thanks Germany for solidarity and calls for more weapons
events.wd_label: Ukrainian Prime Minister thanks Germany for solidarity and calls for more weapons
events.wd_description: Ukrainian Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal thanked Germany for its solidarity in the face of the Russian invasion and called for more weapons during his visit to Berlin, signaling an easing of tensions between Berlin and Kyiv.
events.description: Ukrainian Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal thanked Germany for its solidarity in the face of the Russian invasion and called for more weapons during his visit to Berlin, signaling an easing of tensions between Berlin and Kyiv.

events.name: Shmyhal's visit
events.wd_description: Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal visited Berlin and was welcomed by German Chancellor Olaf Scholz with military honors.
events.description: Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal visited Berlin and was welcomed by German Chancellor Olaf Scholz with military honors.

events.name: meeting with German officials
events.wd_description: Shmyhal met with German officials, including Chancellor Scholz and President Steinmeier, to discuss the military situation, strengthening sanctions, and the need to provide weapons for Ukraine.
events.description: Shmyhal met with German officials, including Chancellor Scholz and President Steinmeier, to discuss the military situation, strengthening sanctions, and the need to provide weapons for Ukraine.

events.name: Shmyhal's tweet
events.wd_description: Shmyhal tweeted about the discussions held during the meeting, focusing on the military situation, sanctions, and the need for weapons.
events.description: Shmyhal tweeted about the discussions held during the meeting, focusing on the military situation, sanctions, and the need for weapons.

events.name: Shmyhal's statement to German media
events.wd_description: Before his trip, Shmyhal acknowledged Germany's progress in supporting Ukraine with weapons but emphasized the need for more, including modern combat tanks like the Leopard 2.
events.description: Before his trip, Shmyhal acknowledged Germany's progress in supporting Ukraine with weapons but emphasized the need for more, including modern combat tanks like the Leopard 2.

events.name: Escalation of tension around Iran-US nuclear talks breakdown
events.wd_label: Escalation of tension around Iran-US nuclear talks breakdown
events.wd_description: Tensions escalated around the breakdown in talks between Iran and the US over Tehran's nuclear program, with warnings from Israel about Iran's capabilities and statements from European nations.
events.description: Tensions escalated around the breakdown in talks between Iran and the US over Tehran's nuclear program, with warnings from Israel about Iran's capabilities and statements from European nations.

events.name: Israel's warning
events.wd_description: Israeli Defense Minister Benny Gantz warned that Iran could produce enough enriched uranium to make three nuclear warheads in a few weeks.
events.description: Israeli Defense Minister Benny Gantz warned that Iran could produce enough enriched uranium to make three nuclear warheads in a few weeks.

events.name: statement by UN nuclear inspectorate chief
events.wd_label: statement by UN nuclear inspectorate chief
events.wd_description: Rafael Grossi, chief of the UN's nuclear inspectorate, stated that restoring the knowledge lost concerning Iran's nuclear activities would be tough, as inspectors and cameras have been barred from key sites by Iran.
events.description: Rafael Grossi, chief of the UN's nuclear inspectorate, stated that restoring the knowledge lost concerning Iran's nuclear activities would be tough, as inspectors and cameras have been barred from key sites by Iran.

events.name: statement by France Germany and the UK
events.wd_label: statement by France Germany and the UK
events.wd_description: France, Germany, and the UK issued a statement saying they could no longer offer concessions in the revival talks and expressed serious doubts about Iran's intentions and commitment to a successful outcome.
events.description: France, Germany, and the UK issued a statement saying they could no longer offer concessions in the revival talks and expressed serious doubts about Iran's intentions and commitment to a successful outcome.

events.name: Ranil Wickremesinghe elected President of Sri Lanka
events.wd_label: Ranil Wickremesinghe elected President of Sri Lanka
events.wd_description: Former Sri Lanka Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe was elected President by lawmakers amid ongoing protests demanding his removal due to his association with former President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.
events.description: Former Sri Lanka Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe was elected President by lawmakers amid ongoing protests demanding his removal due to his association with former President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.

events.name: election of Wickremesinghe
events.wd_description: Ranil Wickremesinghe, a six-time former prime minister and ally of Gotabaya Rajapaksa, was elected President of Sri Lanka by lawmakers, receiving 134 out of 223 votes.
events.description: Ranil Wickremesinghe, a six-time former prime minister and ally of Gotabaya Rajapaksa, was elected President of Sri Lanka by lawmakers, receiving 134 out of 223 votes.

events.name: Wickremesinghe's address
events.wd_description: After being elected, Wickremesinghe addressed the country, emphasizing the need for unity and cooperation despite the division along party lines.
events.description: After being elected, Wickremesinghe addressed the country, emphasizing the need for unity and cooperation despite the division along party lines.

events.name: protest against Wickremesinghe
events.wd_description: A small group of protesters gathered at the president's residence to protest Wickremesinghe's nomination during the voting process.
events.description: A small group of protesters gathered at the president's residence to protest Wickremesinghe's nomination during the voting process.

events.name: EV battery supply chain transformation under the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022
events.wd_label: EV battery supply chain transformation under the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022
events.wd_description: The Inflation Reduction Act of 2022 aims to spur EV adoption by providing tax credits, but its success depends on overcoming the current reliance on battery materials and components from China.
events.description: The Inflation Reduction Act of 2022 aims to spur EV adoption by providing tax credits, but its success depends on overcoming the current reliance on battery materials and components from China.

events.name: tax credit requirements
events.wd_description: To qualify for the tax credit, EV batteries and key minerals must be sourced from the US or free-trade partners, with increasing percentages over time.
events.description: To qualify for the tax credit, EV batteries and key minerals must be sourced from the US or free-trade partners, with increasing percentages over time.

events.name: t: critical minerals sourcing
events.wd_description: Starting in 2023, 40% of critical minerals in EV batteries must be sourced from the US or free-trade partners, increasing to 80% by 2026.
events.description: Starting in 2023, 40% of critical minerals in EV batteries must be sourced from the US or free-trade partners, increasing to 80% by 2026.

events.name: t: battery manufacturing location
events.wd_description: Starting in 2023, 50% of battery components must be manufactured or assembled in North America, reaching 100% by 2029.
events.description: Starting in 2023, 50% of battery components must be manufactured or assembled in North America, reaching 100% by 2029.

events.name: t: exclusion of foreign entities of concern
events.wd_label: t: exclusion of foreign entities of concern
events.wd_description: From 2024, any mining, processing, or manufacturing by a foreign entity of concern will disqualify a vehicle from tax credits, with this requirement extending to critical minerals in 2025.
events.description: From 2024, any mining, processing, or manufacturing by a foreign entity of concern will disqualify a vehicle from tax credits, with this requirement extending to critical minerals in 2025.

events.name: challenges in sourcing materials
events.wd_description: The reliance on China for lithium-ion battery cells and critical minerals poses a significant challenge to meeting the tax credit requirements.
events.description: The reliance on China for lithium-ion battery cells and critical minerals poses a significant challenge to meeting the tax credit requirements.

events.name: t: China's dominance in battery materials
events.wd_label: t: China's dominance in battery materials
events.wd_description: China currently produces 80% of lithium-ion battery cells and dominates the supply chain for critical minerals, making it difficult for the US to source these materials domestically.
events.description: China currently produces 80% of lithium-ion battery cells and dominates the supply chain for critical minerals, making it difficult for the US to source these materials domestically.

events.name: t: difficulty in sourcing specific minerals
events.wd_label: t: difficulty in sourcing specific minerals
events.wd_description: Sourcing minerals like graphite, lithium, and nickel is challenging due to processing locations and lack of free-trade agreements with key suppliers.
events.description: Sourcing minerals like graphite, lithium, and nickel is challenging due to processing locations and lack of free-trade agreements with key suppliers.

events.name: t: time required to establish new mines
events.wd_label: t: time required to establish new mines
events.wd_description: Building new mining operations can take upwards of seven years, making it difficult to quickly increase domestic supply of critical minerals.
events.description: Building new mining operations can take upwards of seven years, making it difficult to quickly increase domestic supply of critical minerals.

events.name: impact on EV sales
events.wd_description: The tax credits could have a limited impact on EV sales in the near term due to the challenges in meeting the new requirements.
events.description: The tax credits could have a limited impact on EV sales in the near term due to the challenges in meeting the new requirements.

events.name: t: uncertainty of US companies' response
events.wd_label: t: uncertainty of US companies' response
events.wd_description: It is uncertain how quickly US companies will be able to scale up production and sourcing to meet the new requirements.
events.description: It is uncertain how quickly US companies will be able to scale up production and sourcing to meet the new requirements.

events.name: t: limited short-term impact
events.wd_description: The tax credits might not significantly boost EV sales in the near term if qualifying batteries and minerals are in short supply.
events.description: The tax credits might not significantly boost EV sales in the near term if qualifying batteries and minerals are in short supply.

events.name: support programs
events.wd_description: Other supporting programs in the Inflation Reduction Act, like production tax credits and loans for building new factories, are crucial to transforming the supply chain.
events.description: Other supporting programs in the Inflation Reduction Act, like production tax credits and loans for building new factories, are crucial to transforming the supply chain.

events.name: t: production tax credits
events.wd_description: Production tax credits in the Inflation Reduction Act support domestic battery manufacturing.
events.description: Production tax credits in the Inflation Reduction Act support domestic battery manufacturing.

events.name: t: loans for new factories
events.wd_description: Loans for building new factories are essential to establishing a robust domestic battery supply chain.
events.description: Loans for building new factories are essential to establishing a robust domestic battery supply chain.
